p: CPET studies were performed at baseline and 6 months postoperatively to assess changes in functional capacity. CPET were performed on a cycle ergometer using an incremental ramp protocol. Expiratory O 2, CO 2 and ventilation were measured breath by breath. Patients were encouraged to perform as maximal exercise as possible. Peak VO 2 was reported as a mean over the last 20 s of exercise.
